Q_DESC:
Define a class to represent a bank account which includes following members : Data members
 1)Name 
2)Account number 
3)Type of account 
4)Balance amt 

Member functions 

a.To assign initial value 
b.To deposit an account 
c.To withdraw an account 
d.To display name, account number & balance

Sample Input 1:
Jack 435 SB 500
500
200

Output 1:
NAME=Jack
ACCNO=435
TYPE=SB
BALANCEAMOUNT=800

Explanation: (Initial amount 500, amount deposited 1500. Now total balance: 2000. Amount withdrawn: 200, now total money=2000-200=1800)
TESTCASE_1:
Jack 435 SB 500
1500
200
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
NAME=Jack
ACCNO=435
TYPE=SB
BALANCEAMOUNT=1800
TESTCASE_2:
Harry 456 SB 1000
200
1300
